mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, S.*FROM (SELECT * FROM SALES_POST ORDER BY POST_NO DESC)S) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM NUM, S.*FROM (SELECT * FROM SALES_POST ORDER BY POST_NO DESC)S) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 8+(4*#{more}) AND 11+(4*#{more})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALES_POST(POST_TITLE, POST_PRICE, POST_CONTENTS, POST_ADDRESS, POST_TAGS, ID, POST_CODE) VALUES(#{post_title}, #{post_price}, #{post_contents}, #{post_address}, #{post_tags}, #{id}, #{post_code})
mapper.update: UPDATE SALES_POST SET POST_TITLE=#{post_title}, POST_PRICE=#{post_price}, POST_CONTENTS=#{post_contents}, POST_ADDRESS=#{post_address} , POST_TAGS=#{post_tags}, POST_CODE=#{post_code} where POST_NO=#{post_no}
